				desc = sex_transition_18
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10003
				}
				# 3: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] wants more than your hands, so he #sub takes#! something #italic wetter#!.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10003
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10005
				}
				# 5: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# You place your open palm below his cock, ready to receive his seed, but his tip seems to be pointing elsewhere...\n
				desc = sex_transition_10005
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10008
				}
				# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10008
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10010
				}
				# 10: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10010
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10013
				}
				# 13: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10013
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10016
				}
				# 16: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10016
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 3
			}
			# defaulted to 6: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_12
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 18: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_18
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.3.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.78
	}
}
LIDAc.2 = {
	# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM: Satisfying your Sweet Tooth
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.2.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = disgust
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 11
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You prepare to wring him dry with your dexterous tongue.\n
				desc = sex_transition_11
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10008
				}
				# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10008
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10010
				}
				# 10: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10010
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 11: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM
			desc = sex_transition_11
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.2.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.79
	}
}

		}

		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room

		}

		event_background = gallows

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}

		character = root

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude

				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}

		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {

					scope:sex_transition = 17
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# You don't resist when he plunges into your mouth to deposit his seed.\n

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 21

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10013
				}

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition

				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10016
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10019
				}
				# 19: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10019
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 17: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_17

		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 7
			}
			# defaulted to 21: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB

				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}

	}

LIDAc.4 = {
	# BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM: A Firm Grasp on His Release
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = dismissal
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = beg
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You pull back and slap his rod, disrupting the build up to his climax.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10008
				}
				# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10008
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10010
				}
				# 10: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10010
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 10: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition_10
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.4.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 35
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 35
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}

		name = LIDAoption.81
	}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 26: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_26
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 31: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_31
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 39: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_39
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 9
			}
			# defaulted to 45: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_45
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.12.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.12.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.12.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0.3
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.83
	}
}

LIDAc.10 = {
	# CREAMPIE_BRED: Something to Remember Him By
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 71
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_71
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 75
				}
				# Lie Face Down
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, #bold drowning#! your thoughts in euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_75
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10066
				}
				# 66: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.COWGIRL failed
				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10066
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10069
				}
				# 69: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10069
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10070
				}
				# 70: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10070
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10072
				}
				# 72: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY failed
				# You try to roll in place, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s paralyzing barrage of thrusts never slows enough to do so.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10072
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10074
				}
				# 74: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "D-Don't fill me!" you shakingly say as his pounding nearly drives you senseless, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10074
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 13
			}
			# defaulted to 71: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_BRED
			desc = sex_transition_71
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 14
			}
			# defaulted to 75: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_BRED
			desc = sex_transition_75
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.10.desc.0
		desc = LIDAc.10.desc.1
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.2
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub 
 NOT = { has_trait =pregnant }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub 
 has_trait = pregnant
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.4
		}
		desc = LIDAc.10.desc.5
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.7
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10 
has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.8
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.9
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.10
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10 
has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.11
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.12
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom 
 NOT = { has_trait =pregnant }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.13
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom 
 has_trait = pregnant
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.14
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait =pregnant } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.15
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait =pregnant 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_sub } 
 NOT = { has_trait =lida_dom }
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.16
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 45.0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 60
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 60
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.86
	}
}
LIDAc.11 = {
	# CREAMPIE_KEEP: Taking It Home
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = ecstasy
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shock
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 70
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# You wrap your legs and arms around him...\n
				desc = sex_transition_70
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10066
				}
				# 66: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.COWGIRL failed
				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10066
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10069
				}
				# 69: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10069
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10070
				}
				# 70: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10070
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 13
			}
			# defaulted to 70: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP
			desc = sex_transition_70
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.2
		}
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.3
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.4
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.5
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 60
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.87
	}
}
